application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Whitebeam - 1m Holistic Crown Reduction to suitable growth points.T.2 Portuguese Laurel - lightly reduce to contain by 0.5m all round	(Exempt from application).	H.3 Cypress Hedge -Trim back maintaining foliation (Exempt from application).	T.4 Miscellaneous Ivy and cuttings - (Exempt from application).		T.5 Laurel - Reduce the height and spread by up to 2m (Exempt from application).G.6 Plum Hawthorn Lilac & Laurel - Reduce in height and trim back by approx 1m (Lilac & Laurel Exempt from application).T.7 Ivy - (Exempt from application).T.8 Yew - 2m Holistic Crown Reduction to suitable growth points (Exempt from application).T.9 Yew - 2m Holistic Crown Reduction to suitable growth points (Exempt from application).T.10 Cypress & Ivy etc - Trim to boundary (Exempt from application).
